name: 2014 Procrastinator Membership Package
description:
LIMITED QUANTITIES! If you’re new to the Rebellion or if you simply want the 2013 and 2014 scarf, then the Procrastinator Package is for you. This package includes all the gear in one deal, the official 2013 and 2014 scarves and parking pass.

Membership benefits include Supporters Summit access, Access to our own reserved parking lot, as well as discounted prices and special offers throughout the season like bus trips and more.

Rise up!

NOTE: If your name, address, or primary email address is different from your Paypal account, please send the correct information in the “Add special instructions to the seller”

name: 2014 Rebel with a Cause Package
description:
Get our premium, most purchased membership package. Get all the gear in one deal, the official scarf and parking pass.

Membership benefits include Supporters Summit access, access to our own reserved parking lot, as well as heavily discounted prices and special offers throughout the season on bus trips and more. 

Rise up!

NOTE: If your name, address, or primary email address is different from your Paypal account, please send the correct information in the “Add special instructions to the seller”

name: 2013 Rebellion Scarf
description:
Looking to keep warm as the Revs push for the playoffs? Need to replace a scarf you swapped at an away trip? Well here's your chance!

This year's scarf is designed on a plaid background. One side has New England written in bold white lettering and below that is our promise, our cause to forever support the club through thick and thin.  On the back, two evergreen trees; a symbol made famous on the flag of New England carried by colonial militia and sewn on to every Revs jersey.  Centered on the back is the signature Rebellion fist.


Members, please use the discount code in the latest email for special member pricing!

name: 2012 NETID Womens T-Shirt
description: The official 2012 Rebellion T-Shirt, designed by you, our fellow Rebels. The front of the t-shirt features the Rebellion fist above our name. While the back of the t-shirt features the “NETID” (New England ‘til I Die) logo and the iconic Minutemen marching. Shirt is "woman's cut." Available in women's sizes small, medium, and large.

name: 2012 NETID Mens T-Shirt
description: The official 2012 Rebellion T-Shirt, designed by you, our fellow Rebels. The front of the t-shirt features the Rebellion fist above our name. While the back of the t-shirt features the “NETID” (New England ‘til I Die) logo and the iconic Minutemen marching. Available in men sizes small, medium, and large.

name: Mens Rise-Up T-Shirt
description: The official 2011 Rebellion T-Shirt, featuring our tag line “Rise up, for the Boys in Blue.” Designed by Chelsea Arruda, owner of ElectrikkClothing.com (Fall River, MA)  Available in men sizes small, medium, large, XL, and XXL.

name: Womens Rise-Up T-Shirt
description: The official 2011 Rebellion T-Shirt, featuring our tag line “Rise up, for the Boys in Blue.” Designed by Chelsea Arruda, owner of ElectrikkClothing.com (Fall River, MA). Shirt is "woman's cut." Available in women sizes small, medium, and large.
